languages.text: "Учись у меня, пока жив{mf||а}. Вы, людишки, совсем не имеете чувства юмора, но тебе повезло познакомиться со мной".
"Learn from me while you're still alive. You humanlings don't have any sense of humour, but you're lucky to have met me."
languages.original_text: "Учись у меня, пока жив{mf||а}. Вы, людишки, совсем не имеете чувства юмора, но тебе повезло познакомиться со мной".

traits.locale_text: "Learn from me while you're still alive. You humanlings don't have any sense of humour, but you're lucky to have met me."
"Learn from me while you're still alive. You humanlings don't have any sense of humour, but you're lucky to have met me."
"Learn from me while you're still alive. You humanlings don't have any sense of humour, but you're lucky to have met me."
"Learn from me while you're still alive. You humanlings don't have any sense of humour, but you're lucky to have met me."

languages.text: “趁你还活着，多向我学习学习吧。你们小人儿没有一点幽默感，但能遇到我，算你运气好。”
languages.original_text: "Learn from me while you're still alive. You humanlings don't have any sense of humour, but you're lucky to have met me."

traits.locale_text: “趁你还活着，多向我学习学习吧。你们小人儿没有一点幽默感，但能遇到我，算你运气好。”

languages.text: «Aprende de mí mientras vivas. Los humanos no tenéis sentido del humor, pero por suerte me has conocido a mí».
languages.original_text: "Learn from me while you're still alive. You humanlings don't have any sense of humour, but you're lucky to have met me."

traits.locale_text: «Aprende de mí mientras vivas. Los humanos no tenéis sentido del humor, pero por suerte me has conocido a mí».

languages.text: 「生きているうちに私から学んでおけ。貴様ら人間はまったくもってユーモアのセンスがないが、私がいて運が良かったな」
languages.original_text: "Learn from me while you're still alive. You humanlings don't have any sense of humour, but you're lucky to have met me."

traits.locale_text: 「生きているうちに私から学んでおけ。貴様ら人間はまったくもってユーモアのセンスがないが、私がいて運が良かったな」

languages.text: "Lernt von mir, so lange Ihr noch lebt. Ihr Menschlinge habt keinen Sinn für Humor, doch Ihr habt Glück, dass Ihr mir begegnet seid."
languages.original_text: "Learn from me while you're still alive. You humanlings don't have any sense of humour, but you're lucky to have met me."

traits.locale_text: "Lernt von mir, so lange Ihr noch lebt. Ihr Menschlinge habt keinen Sinn für Humor, doch Ihr habt Glück, dass Ihr mir begegnet seid."

languages.text: « Inspirez-vous de moi tant que vous êtes encore en vie. Les humains comme vous n'ont aucun sens de l'humour, mais vous avez de la chance : vous m'avez rencontré. »
languages.original_text: "Learn from me while you're still alive. You humanlings don't have any sense of humour, but you're lucky to have met me."

traits.locale_text: « Inspirez-vous de moi tant que vous êtes encore en vie. Les humains comme vous n'ont aucun sens de l'humour, mais vous avez de la chance : vous m'avez rencontré. »

languages.text: "Canın elindeyken benden bir şeyler öğren. Siz insancıklar mizahtan hiç anlamıyorsunuz ama benimle tanıştığın için şanslısın."
languages.original_text: "Learn from me while you're still alive. You humanlings don't have any sense of humour, but you're lucky to have met me."

traits.locale_text: "Canın elindeyken benden bir şeyler öğren. Siz insancıklar mizahtan hiç anlamıyorsunuz ama benimle tanıştığın için şanslısın."
